injection_risks.description: The print_exec function uses subprocess.call with shell=True, which can lead to command injection attacks if the input is not properly sanitized.
The print_check function uses subprocess.check_call with shell=True, which can lead to command injection attacks if the input is not properly sanitized.

The checkout_branch function uses os.getenv to retrieve environment variables and then uses them in a git command. If an attacker can manipulate these environment variables, they may be able to inject malicious commands.

Potential secrets exposure through environment variables
